Trigger.Name: Variables
Trigger.Description:
################################################# ${_screenwidth} = 2560
${_screenheight} = 1390 ################################################# ${var:width} = 500
${var:height} = 150
${var:opacity} = 100 ################################################# ${var:Xright} ${_screenwidth} - 660 = 1900 ${var:Xmid} ${_screenwidth} - 1510 = 1050 ################################################# ${var:Yone} ${_screenheight} - 740 = 650
${var:Ytwo} ${_screenheight} - 690 = 700
${var:Ythree} ${_screenheight} - 640 = 750
${var:Yfour} ${_screenheight} - 590 = 800
${var:Yfive} ${_screenheight} - 540 = 850
${var:Ysix} ${_screenheight} - 490 = 900
${var:Yseven} ${_screenheight} - 440 = 950
${var:Yeight} ${_screenheight} - 390 = 1000
${var:Ynine} ${_screenheight} - 340 = 1050
${var:Yten} ${_screenheight} - 290 = 1100 ##################################################
1900
600(Yone) - 650(Ytwo) - 700(Ythree) - 750(Yfour) - 800(Yfive) - 850(Ysix) - 900(Yseven)
450
150
100
##################################################
Yone Swiftcast is ready
Ytwo MP is ready (Lucid Dreaming)
Ythree Shield is ready(whm, ast) | Aetherflow is ready(sch, smn) | Next song is ready(brd) | Dance is ready(dnc) | Bomb is ready(mch) | Trick Attack is ready(nin)
Yfour Buff is ready
Yfive Refresh dots
Ysix ALL AREAS TRIGGERS
Yseven DUNGEON TRIGGERS
##################################################

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: You have joined the critical engagement
^Your item level has been synced to
You have been rewarded for your contribution in slaying the mark.
The map's glyph of passage opens the path forward!

Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^|]*\|0039\|\|(?<elTime>[^|]*) minutes have elapsed since your last activity

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Wake up. Wake the fuck up

Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^|]*\|0839\|\|One or more party members are new to this duty
